title: How to End Mediocre Weekend Experiences
itunes:title: How to End Mediocre Weekend Experiences
description: Unstuck churches never stop looking to improve their weekend experiences. Tony and Amy discuss why it's important to provide compelling and memorable services every single week.
content:encoded: Unstuck churches never stop looking to improve their weekend experiences. Tony and Amy discuss why it's important to provide compelling and memorable services every single week.
itunes:subtitle: 3 Weekend Service Interventions
itunes:author: Tony Morgan
